meanings.definition: The mother of one's father or mother.
meanings.sent1: My grandmothers always bake delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandmothers over the weekend and we had a lovely time together.
meanings.sent3: When my grandmothers start telling old stories, it's always so entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my grandmothers is a guiding light in my life.
meanings.sent5: The love and warmth of my grandmothers envelop me like a cozy blanket.

meanings.sent1: Learning about my grandmothers' lives helps me understand my family history better.
meanings.sent2: In our family tree, my grandmothers hold a special place as strong women who paved the way.
meanings.sent3: My grandmothers' legacy of resilience and strength inspires me every day.
meanings.sent4: The stories of my grandmothers echo through generations, connecting us all.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of my grandmothers lives on in the values they passed down to us.
